This is a standalone page providing basic unit tests for the ousupsub editor. It contains a script defines an array of javascript testcases. It then looks through those, calling the appropriate editor methods, and adding a table to the HTML with four columns: Input, Expected output, Actual output, Mismatch? (In fact, you can create the table headers in testcleanup.html, and the JS can just add the table rows for the results.)

Input Expected output Actual output Matched
